content: Maximum number of external links created

comment.text: The "Maximum number of external links created" translation key is used to display a tooltip or text label in the UI, indicating the maximum limit of external links allowed. It appears on an icon button and is part of the info panel on the home page, providing context for users when viewing certain types of content.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تم إنشاء الحد الأقصى من الروابط الخارجية' literally translates to 'The maximum number of external links were created'. While understandable, it doesn't convey the inherent limit or allowance implied by 'Maximum number of external links created'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the limit itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: الحد الأقصى لعدد الروابط الخارجية الممكن إنشاؤها

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Δημιουργήθηκε ο μέγιστος αριθμός εξωτερικών συνδέσμων" literally translates to "The maximum number of external links was created." The original English implies a *limit* on the number of links that can be created, not a statement of fact about a creation event. It should reflect a limit or maximum allowed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μέγιστος αριθμός εξωτερικών συνδέσμων (Maximum number of external links)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Enimmäismäärä ulkoisia linkkejä luotu' is not the most natural or accurate Finnish translation of 'Maximum number of external links created'.  'Luotu' (created) is passive and less common in this context. A better translation would focus on a limit.
The translation includes an unnecessary passive verb form that leads to a slightly awkward phrasing. Removing it improves clarity.
The translation '作成される外部リンクの最大数' while technically correct, is a bit wordy and less natural than alternatives. A more concise and fluent translation would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 外部リンクの最大作成数

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "생성된 외부 링크의 최대 갯수" is a literal translation but lacks the nuance of 'Maximum number of external links created'.  While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward in Korean. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 최대 생성 가능한 외부 링크 갯수

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, '갯수' is often shortened to '개' in modern Korean when referring to quantity. While '갯수' isn't wrong, '개' is more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 최대 생성 가능한 외부 링크 개수

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ລິ້ງ' (ling) is a transliteration of 'link' and may be perceived as less formal or less accurate than a more Lao equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more formal Lao term for 'link', such as 'ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່' (cheuam to).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'ສ້າງຂຶ້ນ' (saang khuen) is somewhat redundant when describing creation. The phrase 'ສ້າງ' (saang) implies creation already.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Simplify to 'ສ້າງ' (saang) to make the translation more concise. For example: 'ສູງສຸດຈຳນວນລິ້ງຕ່າງປະເທດທີ່ສ້າງ'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Utworzono maksymalną liczbę linków zewnętrznych' translates literally to 'Maximum number of external links created' but implies an action has already happened. The original English phrase describes a limit or maximum, not a completed action. A better translation would be something like 'Maksymalna dopuszczalna liczba linków zewnętrznych' or 'Maksymalna liczba dozwolonych linków zewnętrznych'.

The Romanian translation 'Numărul maxim permis de link-uri externe a fost depășit' translates to 'The maximum number of external links allowed has been exceeded'. This is not a direct translation of 'Maximum number of external links created'. The original phrase implies a limit on how many links *can be* created, whereas the translation indicates that the limit *has already been exceeded*. This changes the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Numărul maxim de link-uri externe create

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation "Максимални број спољних линкова креирано" is grammatically incorrect. The verb 'креирано' (created) should be in the masculine singular form to agree with 'број' (number).
The phrase "kreirano" (created) doesn't agree in gender/number with "broj" (number). It should be in the nominative case.

The translation 'Maksimum sayıda harici bağlantı oluşturuldu' translates to 'Maximum number of external links created' but implies that the action has already occurred. The English phrase describes a *limit* on the number of links, not a completed action.

The translation "Số lượng liên kết bên ngoài tối đa đã được tạo" is not the best translation for "Maximum number of external links created." It implies the links have already been created. A more accurate translation would convey a limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Số lượng liên kết bên ngoài tối đa có thể tạo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses passive voice ("đã được tạo"). While not strictly incorrect, active voice often sounds more natural and direct in Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Số lượng liên kết bên ngoài tối đa có thể tạo
